faq.question: How do online appointments work?
faq.answer: Sessions are hosted via Zoom or Google Meet. Once booked you will receive a secure link to join from any device.

faq.question: Can I choose my psychiatrist?
faq.answer: Yes. Select the professional you prefer from the professionals section and book in their available calendar.

faq.question: What if this is an emergency?
faq.answer: This service does not provide emergency care. If you or someone near you is at risk, contact local emergency services immediately.

faq.question: What payment methods are available?
faq.answer: You can pay with credit or debit cards through Stripe Checkout. PayPal will be available soon.
